document_data.name: ''Waterdhavian Etiquette: A Guide''
document_data.author: [[Catalan the Mad]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Waterdhavian Etiquette: A Guide''''' was a [[book]] penned by [[Catalan the Mad]] in the mid-15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|A dance of treachery and of taking sides, the waltz called Shifting Alliances pits first the lords against the ladies, then mixes all anew. Madness, naturally, ensues.|Excerpt from ''Waterdhavian Etiquette: A Guide''}}
document_data.Contents: Catalan's work was a guidebook to the etiquette, habits, and scheming of the City of Splendors, [[Waterdeep]]'s nobility.
document_data.History: ''Waterdhavian Etiquette: A Guide'' was published in the {{YearlinkName|1458}}.
